SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "reports" WHERE "reports"."target_account_id" IN (SELECT "accounts"."id" FROM "accounts" WHERE "accounts"."domain" = $?)

SELECT axis.*, ( WITH new_reports AS ( SELECT reports.id FROM reports INNER JOIN accounts ON accounts.id = reports.target_account_id WHERE date_trunc(?, reports.created_at)::date = axis.period AND accounts.domain = ?::text ) SELECT count(*) FROM new_reports ) AS value FROM ( SELECT generate_series(date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, interval ?) AS period ) AS axis
